body: sounds good to me, i guess either `io.ReadSeeker`+`io.Closer` (your CL), or `io.ReadCloser`+`io.Seeker` could work? only reason i didn't suggest it at first, is for some reason `io.Closer` and `io.Reader` weren't already combined into `io.ReadCloser`. anyone out there know the reasoning, if any, around that?
